'''Carice van Houten''' (born 5 September 1976) is a Dutch actress, best-known to English-speaking audiences for her roles in ''[[wikipedia:Repo Men|Repo Men]]'', ''[[wikipedia:Valkyrie (film)|Valkyrie]]'' and ''[[wikipedia:Black Death (film)|Black Death]]'' (alongside ''[[Game of Thrones]]'' actors [[Sean Bean]] and [[Emun Elliott]]). She has won five [[wikipedia:Golden Calf (award)|Golden Calf]] (Dutch: Gouden Kalf) awards for acting. She recently starred in the award winning movie ''Undercover Kitty''. A very popular actress in the Netherlands, she starred in the lead role of [[Wikipedia:Black Book (film)|Black Book]], the most commercially successful Dutch film in history.

In ''Game of Thrones'' Van Houten is playing the role of [[Melisandre]] of Asshai. She was confirmed in the role on 19 July 2011. She is a new starring cast member for the [[Season 2|second season]]. Van Houten discussed her role in an interview with Cyril Falisse from the Ferryman Critical on February 22, 2012. She said "I think I am only in episodes 1, 2, 4 and 10 or something. You are not going to see me that much but in season 3 that we are going to shoot this summer I'll come back with a vengeance." Regarding her role she said "I'm [Stannis'] right hand. I manipulate him. I take the decisions for him almost. I wouldn't say I'm a very sympathetic character. I have a great wig, great red hair. I hope I did it right."<ref>http://lepasseurcritique.blogspot.com/2012/02/interview-carice-van-houten.html</ref>

sections.Behind the scenes: *Carice van Houten was previously asked to audition for a different role when [[season 1]] was shot, but schedule conflicts prevented her from auditioning. She was asked to come back to audition during shooting of [[season 2]], and was cast as Melisandre. <ref>http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0944947/trivia</ref>
